protocol.name: P-GSE28109-1
protocol.text: MAS 5 ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5 signal intensities

protocol.name: P-GSE28109-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana ap1-1;cal1-1 plants were grown in growth room for 28 days. The shoot apices from these plants were used for isolating the cells.

protocol.name: P-GSE28109-4
protocol.text: RNA was isolated using RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE28109-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE28109-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on ATH1 chip. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450. Affymetrix Hybridization oven 640

protocol.name: P-GSE28109-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix Scanner 3000 with 7G upgrade
